entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Data.OleDb.OleDbException.Errors property not being populated with the OleDbError #100501
  • Failed test: baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandledTester/unhandledTester #100495
  • Performance difference between 2 code patterns doing same thing #100493
    Future
  • [wasm-wasi]: release build fails, debug build succeeds #100488
    9.0.0
  • Does NativeAOT have its own API, with which it gets the names of methods and their addresses for Stacktrace? #100486
  • Question: how to pass string pointer without Marshal to NativeAOT dylib ? #100481
  • How to implement c++ VARINET Type in C# #100480
  • performance: In a case, dotnet 8.0 is slower than java 22. #100479
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonSerializer.Deserialize(ReadOnlySequence) #100478
  • Test failure: readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.cmd #100477
  • Test failure: ValueFactory attempted to access the Value property of this instance. #100476
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt. #100475
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Convert Remaining Tests to the Merged Wrapper System #97486
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable support for IsByRefLike types in generics #94415
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ExecuteOnlySpan<T> #100485
  • [API Proposal]: WriteOnlySpan<T> #100302
  • .NET Core 3.0 and plugin scenario - Assembly.LoadFrom fails when an older version of dependency assembly has already been loaded #13471
    Future
  • Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow timeout win arm64 gcstress #100492
  • [wasm] `Assertion: should not be reached at D:/a/_work/1/s/src/mono/mono/sgen/sgen-scan-object.h:93` in `System.Linq.Expressions.Tests` #95805
  • [wasm] `DebuggerTests.ExceptionTests.ExceptionTestAllWithReload` failing with `Expected to only pause because of an exception.` #95943
  • [wasm] AOT tests *build* timing out on Linux #97044
  • The type initializer sometimes doesn't execute for an empty struct #100466
  • [API Proposal]: `Parallel.ForEachTaskAsync` #100482

PullRequests

Created

  • Expand host_runtime_contract to include the entry assembly and probing paths #100503
    area-Host
  • Cache Values Guard #100502
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [ILLink] Fix origin for warnings due to event methods #100500
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update JIT sources to clang-format/clang-tidy 17.0.6 #100498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Migrate various GHashTables to dn_simdhash #100497
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • enable AutomaticOrManual_DoesntFailRegardlessOfWhetherClientCertsAreAvailable test #100496
    area-System.Net.Http, disabled-test, 9.0.0
  • Make JitOptRepeat available in Release builds #100494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize flips between 1 and 0 #100491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix more diagnostics with CA2263 #100490
    area-Meta
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution

Merged

  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix non-deterministic trigger of struct type initializers #100469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build win-x86 NativeAOT runtime pack #100195
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Use SoftFP ABI on linux-bionic-arm #100392
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add OptRepeat phase start/end indications #100471
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Force 2 iterations of OptRepeat #100473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Weak interior handles #100446
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • make Socket useable after cancellation #99181
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Remove various single-scenario YAML parameters in our build scripts and shift implementation responsibility to those scenarios #100115
    area-Infrastructure
  • Rebase the installer build jobs on the global build job template #100110
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    linkable-framework, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Disable default and ambient attribute at runtime with a feature switch #100416
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Fix allocation of empty array in the frozen heap for collectible types #100444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Remove DAM annotations from enum converter #100347
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix typo in extractor.cpp #98940
    area-Single-File, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup NativeAOT math helpers #100375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] mono_wasm_schedule_synchronization_context #100251
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] fix error propagation when calling JSImport of missing JS function #100408
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Include versions and checksums in VMR publishing and remove prepare-artifacts.proj #100004
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100377
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that Sse3.MoveAndDuplicate correctly tracks supporting SIMD scalar loads #100417
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Fix "Cleanup some string operating functions" PR #100451
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Fixed incorrect reversed condition for GT #100372
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add cryptographic operation counts to prevent process crashes #100371
    area-System.Security
  • [cdac] Physical contract descriptor spec #100365
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [browser][MT] disableManagedTransition on UI thread after start #100410
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fixed: potential null reference in XmlTreeGen when DataSet not defined #99306
    area-System.Data
  • JIT: Support Swift error handling for reverse P/Invokes #100429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: initial profile repair #100456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Task.WhenEach to process tasks as they complete #100316
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize equality operators #98196
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

Closed

  • Sometimes build and sometimes error #39753

Created

  • Add nuget localization to the dependency flow #39589

  • Add nuget localization to the dependency flow #39584

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Compiler can't determine best common type for `switch` expression #8025
  • [Proposal]: Collection Expressions Next (C#13 and beyond) #7913

PullRequests

Created

  • Adjust dynamic binding rules for a situation of a single applicable candidate. #8027

Merged

  • Queue extensions syntax topic #8026

Updated

  • Add proposal for "ref and unsafe in iterators and async" #7994
  • Update ref-struct-interfaces.md #8024

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warning on integer divisions #72833
  • overload resolution behavior with implicitly-typed `new` and delegates #72831
  • Cannot close the rename variables dialog #72830
  • "Remove redundant assignment" removes unrelated code #72829

Closed

  • [Question] How to use functionality from nuget packages in project referenced source generator #72356
  • KeyNotFoundException thrown when compiling optional generic partial methods (no modifier) #72431
  • [Bug]: Overriding a member loses nullability analysis from base class #71740
  • [VB] String comparison with string constants can be optimized to either of `String.Equals` (`String.op_Equality`, `op_Inequality`), `String.IsNullOrEmpty`, or `String.CompareOrdinal` #71835
  • [VB] Use `String.Concat` for interpolated strings if possible like C# #71839
  • Avoid unnecessary InvalidCastException for VB.NET #72547
  • Inconsistent dispose behavior between `await using` and `await foreach` #72573
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Move source-generators out of ProjectState and entirely into SolutinoCompilationState #72834
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2419527 #72832
    auto-merge
  • Remove legacy TS EA api #72828
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (#72273)" #72827
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10
  • Report diagnostic when lambda binding count exceeds threshold #72823

Merged

  • Move code that retrieves source generators to running in OOP only #72825
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Further diagnostics-subsystem cleanup #72826
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reapply "Simplify updating the primary workspace without passing in a version #72808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove 'synchronize with build' internal functionality #72802
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72806
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.11
  • Update Rename UI to accommodate for getting suggestions automatically #72790
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • [WIP] Allow language specific handlers to use their own types for serialization #72230
  • Remove ServiceHub config for desktop host #72793
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Edit and continue diagnostic source #72787
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.11
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Print diagnostics in invariant culture (English error messages) in assert text #72816
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72684
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Warn for `yield return` in `lock` #72755
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Support ref struct implementing interfaces in `foreach` and `using` statements #72810
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine CanUpdateComplexParameters and CanUpdateSimpleParameters #54889
  • One Dll File In Wasm #54888
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, single_query #54883
  • [Blazor] Parameter on root page causes loss of layout/CSS #54880
  • Questions about Blazor component disposal #54876
  • [Static Web Assets] Runtime APIs to consume the generated endpoint manifest from the SDK #54875
    9.0-preview4
  • [Static Web Assets] Define mechanism to fingerprint an asset relative path and generate new endpoints for it. #54874
    9.0-preview4
  • [Static web assets] Define static web asset endpoints in the SDK and generate an endpoints manifest #54873
    9.0-preview4
  • SignalR TypeScript client - WebSocket - surface out the 'upgrade' event #54865

Closed

  • Perf regression: caching, plaintext_spring #54863
  • bug #54882
  • Unified Build control update #43637
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf regression: plaintext_spring #54837
  • Perf improvement: single_query, updates #54849
  • Perf regression: mapaction #54859

PullRequests

Created

  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 3) #54878
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Force full reload on popstate #54877
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `77afe8e` #54872
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `77afe8e` #54869
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24201.1 #54868
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `77afe8e` #54866
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Add custom message to NavigationException #54862
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update test-configuration.json #54887
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Skip CodeQL in public builds #54886
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Bump helix-matrix timeout up to 5 hours #54885
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • 1ES-ify SignalR Daily Tests pipeline #54884
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Avoid O(N) string[] allocations for N header values in GetCommaSeparatedValues #54808
    Perf, area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Added retry for CheckInvalidHostingModelParameter #54786
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Support resolving OpenApiPaths entries from document #54847
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Introduce a logger provider that counts warnings and errors #54846
    area-dataprotection
  • Reuse known keys in XmlKeyManager #54490
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • update IdentityModel to latest #54601
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make the key ring cache expire shortly after an immediately-activated key is generated #54517
    area-dataprotection
  • [release/8.0] Convert to 1ES templates #54660
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Convert to 1es templates #54853
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Convert to 1ES templates #54656
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 2) #54804
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Reduce helix-matrix timeout to 5 hours #54778
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Reduce helix-matrix timeout to 5 hours #54777
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Reduce helix-matrix timeout to 5 hours #54779
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Include ContentLength when enumerating HttpHeaders #54760
    area-networking
  • Handle JSON comments and trailing commas in user-jwts #54826
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrade to 8.0.203 from 8.0.101 for MAUI App #21566
  • CollectionView crash on scroll: 'The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first.' #21565
  • NullReferenceException when starting application with empty shell on Windows #21562
  • [iOS] Double dash converts into a single long dash on after 20584 fix #21561
  • WinUI .Net MAUI "error CS5001: Program does not contain a static 'Main' method suitable for an entry point" #21559
  • BoxView Opacity does not work in Android. #21558
  • Grid in ScrollView will cause large cpu usage in android? #21555
  • The problem: CollectionView seems to be really struggling on Android, especially when you scroll through the items quickly. #21554
  • [BUG] Grid is always InputTransparent (.NET MAUI 9.0 Preview 2) #21553
  • Problems Pairing VS For WIn and MACOS #21552
  • Cannot deploy application to Android Emulator (levels 21-23) #21551
  • SvgCachedImage Null Error without ShellPage .NET MAUI 8.0 [ FFImageLoadingCompat.Svg.Maui ] #21550
  • Layout cycle crash on Windows with Button with image inside FlexLayout #21548

Closed

  • [Enhancement] Add MobileBlazorBindings as analogue to xaml #2903
  • Hide "Loading..." behind the splash screen or any other solution #10044
  • Center and fade in the default loading screen. #18548
  • Span LineHeight Wrong on Android #19592
    .NET 8 SR4
  • SwipeView bug remains transparent with SwipeView.SwipeTransitionMode="Reveal" #21260

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Revert "[net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back (#20727)" #21560

Merged

  • [Android] Span line height fix #20352
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label

Updated

  • Making sure FindMauiContext fallbacks to default for the title icon i… #21519
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Prevent image from covering text in buttons if the image is too big #21516
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • Border has a 1 pixel thickness even when it's thickness property is set to 0 - fix #21197
    area/drawing ✏️, control-border
  • [macOS] Fix crash when setting window properties #21357
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, control-window
  • Document NavigableElement #21507
    area/navigation 🧭
  • BindableObject System.NullReferenceException when bindings queue gets messed up #21523
    community ✨
  • Minor optimization for `MergedStyle.SetStyle` #21540
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Android pan fixes #21547
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [Testing] Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bug for Raw SQL queries for unmapped types not working #33453
  • Cannot set an owned, nullable JSON collection from empty to null #33452
  • Please use PrivateAssets when referencing Castle #33450
  • Wrong mapping of nested complex property with generic types and same property name, resulting in InvalidCastException #33449
  • AOT: redesign liftable constant expression so that original expression comes from evaluating the resolver rather than passing it separately #33447
  • Add names for more/all(?) parameters (and lambdas) we generate in materializer code #33446
  • EF.IsDesignTime not set in efcore bundle context #33445

Closed

  • Nested Owned Types with Custom Column Names not Populating Properties #33314
  • Enforce child entity concrete type regarding the parent concrete type in a TPH scenario #33332
  • TPH with Foreign Keys on Derived Classes Mapped to a Single Column #33340
  • Column that follows a JSON Path #33341
  • Plans on bumping `Microsoft.Data.SqlClient` v2.1.7 dependency #33347
  • Win10 vs 11 and 0x80090325: certificate chain issue #33451

PullRequests

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.36.0 to 3.38.1 #33238
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-01
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Change BuildWithDesktopMSBuild to ForceDotNetMSBuildEngine #19251
  • Update Application-Insights licenses #19250

Merged

  • Update vmr-build.yml step for SDK copy #19252
  • Delete Application-Insights patch #19160

Updated

  • Update to the shipping version of MSBuild #19017
  • Update to the shipping version of MSBuild #19041
  • Add Exclusion File Validation & Consistency #19243
  • Move unified build sdk validation to a test project #19090
  • Remove old publishing targets #19244
  • Make SDK previews be in the preview.0 band #19231
  • Enable scenario test execution in VMR build #19222
